caption.title: BI tree of Carduus and related taxa inferred from 78 protein coding cpDNA regions.
caption.p: Numbers indicate supporting values (BP, Bootstrap; PP, Posterior Probability). The asterisk indicates the Scaevola porocarya branch, which is compared with other species in the tree; this branch was reduced five times. Only supporting values under 100 (BP) or 1 (PP) are shown.
